api_list.api_description: Estimate the age of a person based on their first name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The first name to estimate age for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The country code to improve estimation accuracy.

query: Can you estimate the age of a person named Alice?

api_list.api_description: Estimate the age for a batch of names.

required_parameters.name: names
required_parameters.description: A list of first names (up to 10) to estimate ages for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The country code to improve estimation accuracy across all names.

query: I have a list of names: John, Sarah, and Raj. Can you estimate the ages for all of them?

api_list.api_description: Returns your IP address in text format.

query: What is my current IP address in text format?

api_list.api_description: Returns your IP address in JSON format.

query: Can you provide my IP address details in JSON format?
